transArray.content: The room is nice, cleaned by cleaners every day. The location is great, the subway station is just outside the door, and there are all kinds of food around. There is also the Deyun Society, which can go to Tiananmen Square on foot. The only downside is that the sound insulation of the room is too poor. I can hear the snoring and crying of the children next door, which seriously affects my rest.
